TopicTitle: What do you need to research to "add maneuver"

Articles.Content:
I'm playing the career mode, still in the early stages, but I've noticed that you can't do the "add maneuver" thing. What do you need to research to get this, or is it only in sandbox mode?

Edited January 6, 2015 by xriz00
That's "flight planning". You need to upgrade the tracking station and mission control to tier 2.
Maneuver nodes come with the patched conics upgrade. So as armagheddon said, upgrade the tracking station and mission control to tier 2 and you'll be able to place nodes.
